quizzes.question: Which method is used to insert content at the beginning of the selected element?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Adding Content[/h1]

As we have seen in the previous lessons, the [b]html[/b]() and [b]text[/b]() methods can be used to get and set the content of a selected element. However, when these methods are used to set content, the existing content is lost.
jQuery has methods that are used to add new content to a selected element without deleting the existing content: 
[b]append[/b]() inserts content at the end of the selected elements.
[b]prepend[/b]() inserts content at the beginning of the selected elements.
[b]after[/b]() inserts content after the selected elements.
[b]before[/b]() inserts content before the selected elements.
[note]Let's see them in action![/note]
